> Eclipse is very similar...
> 
> - ... \src\main
>    + com.xyz.package1
>    + com.xyz.package2
> 
> - ... \src\test
>    + com.xyz.package1
>    + com.xyz.package2

What I meant to say in the first place is that the *class* and its
corresponding test class cannot be viewed side by side in the tree. The distance
between the two packages is often too big, i.e. it requires scrolling.

Johannes
